entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
